Raid Battles.title: Deoxys (Normal & Defense Forme) in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:
Deoxys (Normal) and Deoxys (Defense) will be in five-star raid battles from October 7, 2025 to October 14, 2025.
There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Deoxys (Normal & Defense Forme) from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:

Raid Battles.title: Mega Sceptile, Mega Blaziken, and Mega Swampert in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Sceptile, Mega Blaziken, and Mega Swampert return to Mega Raids on October 7, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Deoxys (Attack & Speed Forme) in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:
Deoxys (Attack) and Deoxys (Speed) will be in five-star raid battles from October 14, 2025 to October 21, 2025.
There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Deoxys (Attack & Speed Forme) from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:

Raid Battles.title: Mega Mawile and Mega Salamence in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Mawile and Mega Salamence return to Mega Raids on October 14, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Genesect (Douse & Shock Drive) in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:
Genesect, Genesect (Douse), and Genesect (Shock) will be in five-star raid battles from October 21, 2025 to October 28, 2025.
There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Genesect from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:

Raid Battles.title: Mega Houndoom and Mega Absol in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Houndoom and Mega Absol return to Mega Raids on October 21, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Giratina (Altered Forme) in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:
Giratina (Altered) will be in five-star raid battles from October 28, 2025 to November 4, 2025.
There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Giratina (Altered Forme) from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:

Raid Battles.title: Mega Gengar, Mega Sableye, and Mega Banette in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Gengar, Mega Sableye, and Mega Banette return to Mega Raids on October 28, 2025, at 10 am local time.

GO Battle League.title: Ultra League and Jungle Cup: Great League Edition | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Ultra League and Jungle Cup: Great League Edition will run from October 7, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to October 14, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
The following Pokémon will not be allowed.

GO Battle League.title: Master Premier and Great League Remix | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Master Premier and Great League Remix will run from October 14, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to October 21, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
Check back later for more details.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League will run from October 21, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to October 28, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).

GO Battle League.title: Great League and Halloween Cup: Great League Edition | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description: The Great League and Halloween Cup: Great League Edition will run from October 28, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to November 4, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.

GO Battle League.title: Ultra League and Jungle Cup: Great League Edition | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Ultra League and Jungle Cup: Great League Edition will run from November 4, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to November 11, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
The following Pokémon will not be allowed.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League will run from November 11, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to November 18, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).

GO Battle League.title: 2025 Championship Series Cup and Master League: Mega Edition | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The 2025 Championship Series Cup and Master League: Mega Edition will run from November 18, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to November 25, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
The following Pokémon will not be allowed.

GO Battle League.title: Catch Cup: Tales of Transformation: Great Edition, Ultra League, and Master League | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Catch Cup: Tales of Transformation: Great Edition, Ultra League, and Master League will run from November 25, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to December 2, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Petilil Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of October.
October 14: The featured Pokémon isPetililand the special bonus is2× Catch Stardust.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Gastly Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of October.
Gastly may award Gengar Mega Energy when caught during Spotlight Hour.
October 21: The featured Pokémon isGastlyand the special bonus is2× Catch XP.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Sinistea Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of October.
October 28: The featured Pokémon isSinisteaand the special bonus is2× Catch Candy.

Event.title: XP Celebration
Event.description:
Prepare for Pokémon GO’s new leveling journey with massive XP bonuses and exclusive Timed Research!
This event is designed to help Trainers prepare for the upcoming level cap increase from 50 to 80, launching onOctober 15, 2025.
bonuses: +3,000 XP from winning Max Battles
+3,000 XP from winning raids
2× Catch XP from Nice, Great, and Excellent Throws

Event.title: Harvest Festival
Event.description: The Harvest Festival returns to Pokémon GO, featuring the debut of Dipplin and Hydrapple! Discover Syrupy Apples and enjoy special bonuses throughout the event!
bonuses: 2× Candy for catching Pokémon with Pinap Berries and Silver Pinap Berries
Increased chance for apples to appear at PokéStops with an active Mossy Lure Module
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Pumpkaboo and Shiny Smoliv

Event.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Celebration Event
Event.description:
Celebrate the release of Pokémon Legends: Z-A with a Pokémon GO event!
Experience Lumiose City in the Kalos region in a new adventure with Pokémon Legends: Z-A! In celebration of the release of this game, Mega Raids will appear more often in Pokémon GO. Chikorita, Totodile, and Tepig will appear in Timed Research, and avatar items inspired by Lumiose City Pokémon Trainers will be available in the shop.
bonuses: Mega Raids will appear more frequently

Event.title: GO Battle Weekend: Tales of Transformation
Event.description: The following leagues will be active.

Event.title: Halloween 2025 Part I
Event.description:
Have a haunted Halloween tea party with Poltchageist, Sinistcha, and more in Pokémon GO!
Poltchageist and Sinistcha make their Pokémon GO debuts, and for the first time, you can encounter Shiny Sinistea!
bonuses: 2× Candy for transferring Pokémon
2× Catch Candy
GO Pass Deluxe: 3× Candy for transferring Pokémon
GO Pass Deluxe: 3× Catch Candy

Increased chance for Trainers level 31 and up to receive Candy XL for transferring Pokémon

Event.title: Halloween 2025 Part II
Event.description:
Costumed Teddiursa and costumed Noibat join the party in Halloween 2025 Part II!
The Halloween 2025 Part II event will take place from October 27, 2025 at 10 am to November 2, 2025 at 8 pm.
bonuses: 2× Candy for transferring Pokémon

Event.title: Into the Wild
Event.description: It’s time to venture back Into the Wild for a Dark- and Fairy-type tale! Something is stirring deep in the wild…Are you ready to discover what lies ahead during the Into the Wild event?
bonuses: No Remote Raid limit from Saturday, November 15, to Sunday, November 16, 2025
Remote Raid limit increased to 30 from Monday, November 10, to Friday, November 14, 2025
Trainers can receive special event stickers from PokéStops and Gifts
You can use a Charged TM to help a Shadow Pokémon forget the Charged Attack Frustration

Event.title: Trade Days | Tales of Transformation
Event.description:
Enjoy trade bonuses every Sunday throughout Tales of Transformation!
On Sundays from September 7 to November 30, 2025, Trainers will get a pile of trade bonuses, including one additional Special Trade!
bonuses: -10% Stardust cost for trades
Earn two Candy XL from trades
Increased chance of Lucky Trade for any trade
One additional Special Trade

Raid Hour.title: Deoxys (Attack & Speed Forme) Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Deoxys (Attack & Speed Forme) is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Genesect Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Genesect, Genesect (Douse), and Genesect (Shock Drive) is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Giratina (Origin Forme) Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Giratina (Origin Forme) is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

PokéStop Showcase.title: Pumpkaboo, Gourgeist, and Applin PokéStop Showcase
PokéStop Showcase.description: There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Pumpkaboo, Gourgeist, and Applin. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

Raid Day.title: Mega Rayquaza Raid Day
Raid Day.description: Soar to new heights on Mega Rayquaza Raid Day!
bonuses: 2× Stardust from Raid Battles
50% more XP from Raid Battles
Increased chance of encountering Shiny Rayquaza from Mega Raids
Increased chance to get Rare Candy XL from Raid Battles
Receive up to eight additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of 14)
Receive up to five additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of six)
Remote Raid Pass limit increased to 20 from Friday, October 17, at 5:00 p.m. to Saturday, October 18, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. PDT

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Gastly during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Delightful Days. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!
OnOctober 20, 2025, the featured Dynamax Pokémon isGastly.

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Woobat during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Delightful Days. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!
OnOctober 27, 2025, the featured Dynamax Pokémon isWoobat.

Max Battles.title: Gigantamax Garbodor Max Battle Day
Max Battles.description: Find trash and treasure during Gigantamax Garbodor Max Battle Day!
bonuses: 1/4 adventuring distance to receive Max Particles*
2× Max Particles from exploring*
2× XP from Max Battles
8× Max Particles from Power Spots
All Power Spots will host Gigantamax Battles
From October 31 at 5:00 p.m. to November 1 at 8:00 p.m. PDT (GMT −7), the daily Remote Raid limit will increase from 10 to 20
Max Particle collection limit increased to 1,600
Max Particle collection limit increased to 5,600
Power Spots will refresh more frequently
Two additional Special Trades

GO Pass.title: GO Pass: Halloween 2025
GO Pass.description:
Happy haunts arrive for GO Pass: Halloween 2025!
From Tuesday, October 21, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, November 2, at 8:00 p.m. local time, the GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe for Halloween Part I and Part II will be available in Pokémon GO!
bonuses: 2× Candy for transferring Pokémon
2× Catch Candy
3× Candy for transferring Pokémon

GO Pass.title: GO Pass: October
GO Pass.description:
No tricks, just treats! Earn PokéCoins for progressing in GO Pass: October!
Trainers, Get ready for a special treat this Halloween season during Pokémon GO’s Tales of Transformation! Bonus PokéCoins will be available to earn during this month’s GO Pass on both the free track and the paid GO Pass Deluxe track. Check out this exciting bonus and more in GO Pass: October!
From Tuesday, October 7, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, November 4, at 10:00 a.m. local time, the GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe for October will be available in Pokémon GO!
bonuses: 2× Daily Adventure Incense duration
2× Stardust and XP from hatching Eggs
Hold up to 30 Gifts in your Item Bag
Hold up to 40 Gifts in your Item Bag
Open up to 40 Gifts per day
Open up to 50 Gifts per day
Receive up to 125 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs

GO Pass.title: GO Pass: Into the Wild
GO Pass.description:
Before Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global kicks off around the world, take this chance to sharpen your skills and prepare for your big adventure! Hyper Training is back with the debut of the Silver Bottle Cap!
From Monday, November 10, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, November 16, at 6:00 p.m. local time, the GO Pass and the GO Pass Deluxe for Into the Wild will be available in Pokémon GO!
bonuses: +1 Candy XL from Max Battles
+1 Candy XL from raids
+1 Candy from Max Battles
+1 Candy from raids
2× Incense Duration
5,000 additional XP from completed Max Battles
5,000 additional XP from completed raids

Wild Area.title: Pokémon GO Wild Area: Nagasaki
Wild Area.description:
In this next chapter of Pokémon GO Wild Area, get ready to test your skills once again as you encounter Dark- and Fairy-type Pokémon, including Grimmsnarl, the Bulk Up Pokémon! Plus, exceptionally powerful Pokémon known as mighty Pokémon are appearing in the wild—use GO Wild Area–exclusive GO Safari Balls to improve your odds of catching these rare Pokémon.
All event gameplay is exclusive to ticket holders.
Tickets for Pokémon GO Wild Area: Nagasaki are now available on theNiantic events portal.
(including applicable taxes and fees)
Location:A citywide experience across Nagasaki City, JapanDates:November 7, 8, or 9, 2025Time:9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. JST
Tickets for Pokémon GO Wild Area: Nagasaki include one day of event gameplay, and attendees may purchase add-ons that extend the gameplay for an additional day. One-day tickets are ¥3,600 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency, including applicable taxes and fees). Event gameplay will be available only at the date, time, and location specified on your ticket.
Note:Tickets to this event are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets are first come, first served and are available for purchase while supplies last.
bonuses: 1 additional Candy XL for catching Pokémon in Max Battles (Trainers level 31+)
1 additional Candy for catching Pokémon in Max Battles

Wild Area.title: Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global
Wild Area.description:
Trainers around the world can gear up for a worldwide adventure during Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global, available in-game for two days only!
Looking to enhance your GO Wild Area weekend with exclusive Special Research, additional bonuses, and an increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon? Purchase a global event ticket from the Pokémon GO Web Store!
Tickets for Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global are available now in the in-game Shop andPokémon Go Web Storefor$11.99 USD.
Trainers who purchase their Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global ticket on the Pokémon GO Web Store will receive a special avatar item—the Flower Crown!
You can purchase your ticket on the web store until the last day of the event to receive this avatar item.
For details on the in-person event in Nagasaki, Japan,click here.

Community Day.title: November Community Day
Community Day.description: November Community Day is on November 30, 2025. Stay tuned for the announcement of the featured Pokémon.

Season.title: Tales of Transformation
Season.description: Welcome to the next Pokémon GO Season: Tales of Transformation!
bonuses: Guaranteed Candy XL when trading Pokémon (Level 31+)
Guaranteed Rare Candy XL from five-star Raid Boss during Raid Hour (Level 31+)
Increased XP and Stardust for seven-day Pokémon catch streak
Increased XP for seven-day PokéStop spin streak
Increased XP from going up a Friendship level
One additional Candy when trading Pokémon

City Safari.title: Sydney, Australia - Pokémon GO City Safari
City Safari.description:
Pokémon GO City Safari is coming to Sydney, Australia, on December 13 and 14, 2025! Set off on a citywide adventure as you discover the vibrant stories, new friends, and exciting Pokémon waiting for you in Sydney!
Whether you’re a resident of Sydney or a first-time visitor, your Pokémon GO City Safari will take you across the city in an all-new way—from historic landmarks to local favorites, get ready for a taste of the city with Pokémon GO by your side!
One-day Tickets are AU$19 (including any applicable taxes and fees) on either December 13, 2025 or December 14, 2025, from 10 am to 6 pm AEDT.
bonuses: 1 additional Candy XL awarded for catching Pokémon in five-star raids and Mega Raids (Trainers level 31+)
1/2 Egg Hatch Distance
1/2 Stardust Cost for trades within the city
2× Hatch Candy
2× Hatch Stardust
2× Hatch XP
3 additional Candy awarded for catching Pokémon in five-star raids and Mega Raids
Additional 5,000 XP from completed raids
An increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon
Lure Modules (excluding Golden Lures) activated during the event will last for four hours
Lure Modules activated during the event will last for four hours
Trades will require 50% less Stardust
Up to 12 free Raid Passes per day by spinning Photo Discs at Gyms
Up to five Special Trades can be made during the day on your ticket while in Sydney!
Up to five Special Trades daily within the city
Your buddy may find the City Safari–exclusive Tiny Compass souvenir
